text: The Conjuring 2 is a 2016 American supernatural horror movie directed by James Wan. It is the sequel to 2013's The Conjuring and the third movie in The Conjuring series. ==Background== Patrick Wilson and Vera Farmiga reprise their roles as paranormal investigators and authors Ed and Lorraine Warren from the first movie. The movie is about the Warrens as they travel to England to help the Hodgson family, who are experiencing poltergeist activity in Enfield council house in 1977. This event became referred to as the Enfield Poltergeist. ==Release== The Conjuring 2 was released in North America on June 10, 2016. The movie received positive reviews from critics and has made over $320 million worldwide. A spin-off prequel movie, The Nun, is scheduled to be released in 2018. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:2016 horror movies Category:American horror movies Category:American ghost movies Category:Movies set in the 1970s Category:Movies set in London Category:Warner Bros. movies
title: The Conjuring 2
